name: Christmas Horror Land (PreAlpha)
description:
Description

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

I am working on a horror game project about a guy that wakes up during Christmas night and goes to get some milk out of the fridge.  But he hears something outside and decides to go have a look around and sees something he wished he never seen... Join me on my journey of creating  my first released game Christmas Horror Land a spine chilling horror game by us at Hungry Entertainment the team of one right now (me, Owen Graham) but hopefully soon to be more! If you want to join us at Hungry Entertainment or even just for one game then we are always open to new developers, because you can never have enough! Christmas Horror Land will be updated every Christmas so stay for future updates.  (This Is Pre Alpha So Please Don't Expect Much). Oh and Its Only Available for Windows at the moment, will work on making it for more devices.

Contacting

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

For contacting me for support or want to help or join Hungry Entertainment use this Gmail = graham.o@wolfcreek.ab.ca and if that does not work then try this one home.acount546@gmail.com (MAKE SURE ONLY ONE C) preferably use first Gmail.
